title: Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Closed for Labor Day  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Closed for Labor Day  The Theodore Roosevelt Inaugural Site will be closed for Labor Day on Monday, September 5.          Tour modification for September 25, 2016  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Tour modification for September 25, 2016  On Sunday, September 25, between 2:30 and 3:30 no guided tours will be offered due to an event sponsored by Episcopal Community Discovery Sunday.
